reviewText: Dr Miller explains an awesome concept that really works!
I had this on vhs tape years ago and lent it to someone (never returned).  My mare is having another foal in May and I wanted a refresher on all I needed to do.  This time I won't lend out my dvd!
Very informative DVD. Great info on imprinting your foal.  This truly works!  Used it on our foal and she has been awesome from the beginning.  Easy to start under saddle, even for novices like us!
